Package org.dellroad.dataskin.ops

Interface InstanceAction<T,C,R>

Type Parameters:
T - target Java type
C - configuration type for this action
R - result type for this action
All Superinterfaces:
Action<C,R>, InstanceOperation<T,C,R>, Operation<C,R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInstanceAction
public interface InstanceAction<T,C,R> extends Action<C,R>, InstanceOperation<T,C,R>
An action that is configured in the context of a particular target instance.
